plugin.name: Quick Capture
plugin.description: Commands to quickly add tasks/todos or general text to NotePlan notes
plugin.author: Eduard & Jonathan

plugin.commands.name: int
plugin.commands.description: Quickly add a task to your 'ðŸ“¥ Inbox' note.

plugin.commands.name: qath
plugin.commands.description: Quickly add a task to a note's heading

plugin.commands.name: qalh
plugin.commands.description: Quickly add text to a note's heading

plugin.commands.name: qpt
plugin.commands.description: Quickly prepend a task to any note

plugin.commands.name: qat
plugin.commands.description: Quickly append a task to any note

plugin.preferences.name: inboxFilename
plugin.preferences.description: leave blank for daily note, or give relative filename (e.g. 'Folder/Inbox.md')

plugin.preferences.name: addInboxPosition
plugin.preferences.description: whether to 'append' or 'prepend' new tasks to the Inbox note
